scripts.start: cd apps && cd web && next start
scripts.d: npm run dx && npm run dev
scripts.dx: npm i && npm run dx:up && npm run prisma:migrate-dev
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:generate -w @documenso/prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate-dev: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:migrate-dev -w @documenso/prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate-deploy: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:migrate-deploy -w @documenso/prisma
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run with:env -- npx prisma studio --schema packages/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.reset:hard: npm run clean && npm i && npm run prisma:generate
